hero.title: Learn Tech Skills for Free
hero.subtitle: Blended learning · Local Community · Practical Projects

features.title: Totally free
features.body: We cover tuition so you can focus on learning and outcomes.

features.title: Networking
features.body: Grow your network through mentors, peers, and partners.

features.title: Job Ready
features.body: Build projects and a portfolio that accelerate your job search.

stories.title: Max Startup is Rocketing
stories.excerpt: From concept to seed funding in 6 months.
stories.fullDescription: Max joined TechLabs with a background in business but no technical skills. Through the Web Development track, he learned to build his own MVP and validate his startup idea. Within 6 months of graduating, he secured seed funding and now leads a team of 5 developers.

stories.title: Lia just landed her first client
stories.excerpt: Freelance success after the DS track.
stories.fullDescription: Lia was a marketing professional looking to transition into data science. The Data Science track at TechLabs gave her the practical skills and portfolio she needed. She now works as a freelance data analyst, helping startups make data-driven decisions.
achievements: First client within 2 weeks of graduation

stories.title: Anna is now in the head of Tech
stories.fullDescription: Anna came to TechLabs as a junior developer looking to advance her career. The comprehensive curriculum and mentorship helped her develop both technical and leadership skills. She's now Head of Technology at a growing fintech company.
achievements: Promoted from Junior to Lead in 8 months

support.title: Support Tech Education
support.body: Help us empower the next generation by funding cohorts and resources.

faqs.q: Where does the TechLabs take place?
faqs.a: We run in multiple cities and online. Check the application page for your city.

faqs.q: Is it a full time program?
faqs.a: No. It is designed to fit alongside work or studies (part-time).
